pullrequest.title: Write to disk from a background thread in log recorder

content.raw: This is a good idea, but since ign-transport doesn't depend on ign-common, I don't have a nice way of printing a console message based on a flag. I was thinking of using `LMSG` for the time being and creating an issue to make an API for setting `transport::log::__verbosity` from ign-gazebo. Thoughts?
